alert.note: Alert for Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:59PM MDT until May 07 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Todd County in south central South Dakota... Southwestern Tripp County in south central South Dakota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Hidden Timber to 2 miles west of Sicangu Village, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hidden Timber around 605 PM CDT. Littleburg around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Keyapaha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
